channel.title: Stz_Mansion_Gunz
channel.description:
Well, this is a pretty old version of the map, but I was wondering of what people thought of it so far. No suggestions yet since Ill be putting up a video of the more recent version some time tommorow. Right now im getting to the point where im losing motivation for working on it, plus soon ill have no time to work on it due to moving. So hope this catches the eyes of CSS players here.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZgxC75EFRqI[/url]

item.title: Stz_Mansion_Gunz
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
It has lots of potential. I say work on your hammer skills just a bit more and you could make a great map.

Read full topic

item.title: Stz_Mansion_Gunz
item.dc:creator: Stuntz
item.description:
About 2 weeks later, and finally got around to making a video of how its turning out so far. Its still lacking detail and the 3D Skybox and what not, so dont assume all the things will be kept how it is. The map is so large I keep thinking of how awesome it would be as a zombie map, so after im done with this, im going to heavily change it up. Have it storming, make the logic_timer have lighting (No lighting strikes, just the flash) and raining. Going to add rooms in the main lobby, along with vents that will have a button for zombies to press to kill vent campers. (Dont know if I should stick with that idea?)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GPunPXy3nJE

Read full topic
